com.sleepycat.client

Class SslConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sleepycat.client.SslConfig

  • public class SslConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies the attributes used to setup SSL connections.

        Configure key store parameters.
        Parameters:
        keyStore - the path to the key store

        keyManagerType - the KeyManager type
        keyStoreType - the KeyStore type
